subject: Officiating (Sports)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: After about 2,400 tests, Dirk Broichhausen, chief executive of GoalControl, has set the bar for success for his company’s goal-line system at perfection.
snippet: After about 2,400 tests, Dirk Broichhausen, chief executive of GoalControl, has set the bar for success for his company’s goal-line system at perfection.
